N-20020917 on w2k:

I tried to add the JUnit view using

  Menu :: Window :: Show View

No view is shown, but a log is generated with an NPE. I tried to open the
members view of the Java Browing perspective and got the same result.
However a second attempt on showing the same view succeds w/o any problem.

Maybe this is a problem only existing in the nightly build?

Fixed released for the build today.

I can't reproduce it anymore. Please could you point me to the smoke test that 
is failing. I could not find the smoke tests in www.eclipse.org

I haven't seen this problem happen again... Markus Keller was a co-op who has 
left us last week. The smoke test is here on our internal website:

  http://www.zrh.oti.com/webprojects/jabiru2000/smoketest/smoke.htm

Not sure how that would help you since I don't know when the NPE happened.

Marking this as WORKSFORME since it has not happened anymore and we have 
another bug report about checking for null after calling getPart(..).
